item.title: Version 5.6.1
item.description:
Focusmo 5.6.1

Whatâ€™s New

  • Minimal timer reset position : Reset the minimal timer to its default position is now optional

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed: Floating timer complete button not visible.
  • Fixed: Navigation issues when using shortcuts to open screens in main window.
  • Fixed: Windows not opening properly from three dot menu in floating island.
  • Fixed: Default values not registering correctly in settings.
  • Fixed: Logging prompt appearing non-stop
